summary.title: Years Experience
summary.description: Experienced .NET Backend Developer with expertise in architecting scalable financial systems and RESTful APIs.

experience.description: Building Recruitment Websites with Umbraco CMS and .NET Core. Architecting high-performance solutions and developing robust RESTful APIs.
Led a team in architecting complex web applications using ASP.NET Core. Optimized SQL Server databases and implemented CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps.
Developed back-end components using ASP.NET MVC and C#. Integrated RESTful APIs and utilized Entity Framework for database interactions.
